title: Five Suns of Anarchy
description: Part three of the three-part Five Suns SagaWhen they assassinated the president, former CIA agent Coyle gave up. He relinquished any hope of a future and became a recluse. But now, a high-ranking government official has emerged from hiding, and offers Coyle a mission. If he accepts it, heâ€™ll have to track down the architects of the plan that killed America, and transport them across the country to face judgment for their crimes. Part dystopian epic, part espionage thriller, the Five Suns of Chaos novella brings Volume One of the story of The Five Suns Saga to a close.Part dystopian epic, part espionage thriller, Five Suns of Anarchy features six interconnected short stories before, during, and after the downfall of society, with each one unlocking another piece of the mystery of how the world collapsed.
author: Jim Heskett
